cause.description:
About 300,000 girls and women from tribal belts of India have been trafficked and forced into work. making them vulnerable to physical, emotional and sexual abuse.
We need to:
1) Create awareness in villages about the situation of domestic workers through street plays, videos, press, handouts, radio & television programs, and debate.
2) Rescue and rehabilite children and young women from forced labour and/or abuse
3) Reduc exploitation of women and children through designing and implementing practices in source areas
4) Bring about an attitudinal change in the general public regarding children and their rights.
1. Every woman and child needs to be ensured basic human rights of Education, Gender & Equality and Economic Development.
cause.mission: to campaign and intervene at source levels to rescue women and children in India from forced labor
cause.name: Rescue Forced Laborers
